: : Skulletron : :

Skulletron's getting ready to resort to drastic measure=
s.  He doesn't even quite know what he is going to do, either.  But one thi=
ng he does know, is that whatever he decides to do, it is going to be big.
=

Skulletron:  Look boys, I didn't come here to start a fight.  I admit, I a=
m a bit headstrong when it comes to facing up to enemies, but I came with s=
ecret intentions, my own agenda.

Skulletron struggles with words and thoug=
hts.  He has to come up with something fast, and won't have time to think a=
bout the effects...
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Richard Allen 
=
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Tuesday, January 28, 2003 3:58 PM
  S=
ubject: Re: nWo base


  : : Wolfenstein : : 

  He looks at Skulletron, no=
t knowing what he had planned for sure. 

  : : Razor : : 

  Razor steps f=
orward a bit from the rest of the nWo. 

  Razor: I am the leader here. Wha=
t do you have to say? 

  The preceding has been paid for by the 

  New Wo=
rld Order 

   LurkerAbyss <1641coburn@...> wrote: 

    OOC:  Sorry=
 for holding things up, I've been really, really lazy in the last several w=
eeks.  I'm back on task now, though!

    : : Skulletron : :

    Skulletro=
n stands still, staring into the distance blankly for a moment.  He then sn=
aps back to reality, ope, there goes gravity.

    Skulletron:  Wait!  I ha=
ve a bargain!

    He shouts out loudly.  He stops and holds his hand out t=
o the nWo defenders, gesturing to hold on for a second.

    Skulletron:  P=
lease, get your leader, I can assure you that I won't waste your time!
